content.question: Upload your documents
content.uploadDigitalPhoto: You need to upload a digital photo of the following documents:
content.marriageCertificateContent: your original marriage certificate or a certified copy
content.translationContent: a certified English translation of your marriage certificate
content.nameChangeContent: proof of your name change, for example a deed poll. Upload proof of each change if you’ve done it more than once since you got married
content.camera: You can use your phone to do this now if it has a camera.
content.howToTakeInfo1: Place your certificate on a flat service in a well lit room. Use a flash if you need to.
content.howToTakeInfo2: Take a good quality picture of the entire certificate. You should be able to see its edges.
content.howToTakeInfo3: Check that the image is in focus. You must be able to read all the writing on the certificate, including the handwriting. Zoom in if you need to check this.
content.howToTakeInfo4: Send the picture to this device (e.g. by email) and save it.
content.limitations: The image must be of the entire document and has to be readable by court staff. You can upload most types of image (up to 10MB).
content.otherDocuments: You can also upload other documents that you need to send.
content.cantUpload: If you can't upload your documents
content.continue: Continue with your application. When you're finished you'll be given a reference number and the court's address.
content.emailOrPost: You can email or post your documents to the court.
content.keptAndReturned: You need to send the original marriage certificate or a certified copy if you're sending it by post. Do not send a photocopy. Your certificate will be kept and won't be returned to you.
content.clickToChooseFile: Choose a file or take a photo
content.fileToBig: This file is too large and exceeds the 10mb limit. Please reduce the size of the file and try again.
content.dictMaxFilesExceeded: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.
content.errorUnknown: Sorry, there has been a problem uploading this file. Please try again later.
content.errorFileSizeTooLarge: This file is too large and exceeds the 10mb limit. Please reduce the size of the file and try again.
content.errorFileTypeInvalid: The file must be in jpg, bmp, tiff, png or PDF format.
content.errorMaximumFilesExceeded: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.
content.errorVirusFoundInFile: This file has failed a virus check. Please try again with a different file.

marriageCertificateFiles.invalid: The files you have uploaded are invalid.

errorUnknown.invalid: Sorry, there has been a problem uploading this file. Please try again later.

errorFileSizeTooLarge.invalid: This file is too large and exceeds the 10mb limit. Please reduce the size of the file and try again.

errorFileTypeInvalid.invalid: The file must be in jpg, bmp, tiff, png or PDF format.

errorMaximumFilesExceeded.invalid: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.

errorVirusFoundInFile.invalid: This file has failed a virus check. Please try again with a different file.

content.question: Llwytho eich dogfennau
content.uploadDigitalPhoto: Mae angen ichi lwytho llun digidol o’r dogfennau canlynol:
content.marriageCertificateContent: eich tystysgrif priodas wreiddiol neu copi ardystiedig
content.translationContent: a cyfieithiad Saesneg ardystiedig o’ch tystysgrif priodas
content.nameChangeContent: prawf o’ch newid enw, er enghraifft a gweithred newid enw. Dylid cynnwys prawf o bob newid enw os ydych wedi newid eich enw fwy nag unwaith ers ichi briodi
content.camera: Gallwch ddefnyddio’ch ffôn symudol i wneud hyn nawr os oes ganddo gamera.
content.howToTakeInfo1: Rhowch eich tystysgrif ar rywbeth gwastad mewn ystafell sydd â digon o olau. Defnyddiwch fflach y camera os bydd angen.
content.howToTakeInfo2: Tynnwch lun da o'r dystysgrif gyfan. Dylech allu gweld corneli'r ddogfen.
content.howToTakeInfo3: Gwiriwch fod y llun yn glir. Rhaid ichi allu darllen yr holl ddogfen, yn cynnwys unrhyw lawysgrifen. Gwnewch y llun yn fwy os byddwch angen gwirio hyn.
content.howToTakeInfo4: Anfonwch y llun i’r ddyfais hon (e.e. drwy e-bost) a’i gadw.
content.limitations: Rhaid i'r llun ddangos y ddogfen gyfan a bod yn ddigon clir i staff y llys ei darllen. Gallwch lwytho’r rhan fwyaf o fathau o ddelweddau (hyd at 10MB).
content.otherDocuments: Gallwch lwytho dogfennau eraill y bydd eu hangen arnoch hefyd.
content.uploadedFiles: Ffeiliau sydd wedi cael eu llwytho
content.cantUpload: Os nad ydych yn gallu llwytho eich dogfennau
content.continue: Parhau â'ch cais. Pan fyddwch wedi gorffen, byddwch yn cael cyfeirnod a chyfeiriad y llys.
content.emailOrPost: Gallwch e-bostio neu bostio eich dogfennau i’r llys.
content.keptAndReturned: Mae angen ichi anfon y dystysgrif priodas wreiddiol neu gopi ardystiedig os ydych yn ei hanfon drwy’r post. Peidiwch ag anfon llungopi. Bydd y llys yn cadw eich tystysgrif ac ni fyddwn yn ei dychwelyd atoch.
content.noFiles: Nid oes ffeiliau wedi cael eu llwytho
content.fileToBig: Mae’r ffeil yn rhy fawr ac yn fwy na'r 10mb a ganiateir. Gwnewch y ffeil yn llai a rhowch gynnig arall arni.
content.pendingUpload: Ffeil ar fin cael ei llwytho
content.errorUnknown: Mae’n ddrwg gennym, ond roedd problem wrth lwytho'r ffeil hon. Rhowch gynnig arall arni yn hwyrach ymlaen.
content.errorFileSizeTooLarge: Mae’r ffeil yn rhy fawr ac yn fwy na'r 10mb a ganiateir. Gwnewch y ffeil yn llai a rhowch gynnig arall arni.
content.errorFileTypeInvalid: Rhaid i'r ffeil fod ar ffurf jpg, bmp, tiff, png neu PDF.
content.errorVirusFoundInFile: Mae'r ffeil hon wedi methu gwiriad firws. Rhowch gynnig arall arni gyda ffeil wahanol.

marriageCertificateFiles.invalid: Mae’r ffeiliau yr ydych wedi eu llwytho yn annilys.

errorUnknown.invalid: Mae’n ddrwg gennym, ond roedd problem wrth lwytho'r ffeil hon. Rhowch gynnig arall arni yn hwyrach ymlaen.

errorFileSizeTooLarge.invalid: Mae’r ffeil yn rhy fawr ac yn fwy na'r 10mb a ganiateir. Gwnewch y ffeil yn llai a rhowch gynnig arall arni.

errorFileTypeInvalid.invalid: Rhaid i'r ffeil fod ar ffurf jpg, bmp, tiff, png neu PDF.

errorVirusFoundInFile.invalid: Mae'r ffeil hon wedi methu gwiriad firws. Rhowch gynnig arall arni gyda ffeil wahanol.
